accuracy.description: The degree to which the final answer is correct and meets the question's requirements.

reasoning_clarity.description: How clear and understandable the reasoning or logic behind the answer is.

process_efficiency.description: The effectiveness and economy of the steps taken to arrive at the answer.

compliance_with_instructions.description: Extent to which the solution adheres to the task-specific instructions and constraints.

solution_completeness.description: Whether the solution addresses all aspects of the task and provides a full response.

communication_effectiveness.description: How effectively the solution is communicated back to the user, including clarity and conciseness.

use_of_resources.description: How well the system utilizes available resources (agents, databases, internet, etc.) to solve the task.
